thread.title: Virginia executes serial killer who claimed mental disability
thread.title_full: Virginia executes serial killer who claimed mental disability | News24

author: news24.com
title: Virginia executes serial killer who claimed mental disability
text:
Richmond - Virginia on Thursday put to death a convicted serial killer who claimed mental disability in the US state's first execution in almost three years.
Alfredo Prieto, a 49-year-old native of El Salvador, was pronounced dead at 21:17 at the Greensville Correctional Centre, the state Department of Corrections said in a statement.
Prieto's last words were, "I would like to say thanks to all my lawyers, all my supporters, and all my family members. Get this over with," the statement said. Prieto was accompanied by an attorney, it said.
Prieto was convicted of the 1988 murder of a Virginia couple and had been on death row in California. Virginia officials said in court filings he had been convicted of killing or suspected of killing at least nine people.
